1.0.0.name: wordpress/mobeye-widget
1.0.0.description: To start discover new world with MobEye widget all you need is to create a channel on MobEyeVision.com that is a piece of cake. Send us request to support@mobeye.com and follow the instructions. The whole process will only take a couple of minutes, and after that you can start broadcasting.
